title: Adrenodoxin allosterically alters human cytochrome P450 11B enzymes to accelerate substrate binding and decelerate release
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00015C, Paper

Cara Loomis, Sang-Choul Im, Emily Scott
Two human mitochondrial membrane CYP11B enzymes play a pivotal role in steroidogenesis. CYP11B1 generates the major glucocorticoid cortisol, while CYP11B2 catalysis yields the primary mineralocorticoid aldosterone. Catalysis by both requires...
